alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 2:21AM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers and patchy blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Chino Valley, Paulden, Payson, Pine-Strawberry and Prescott Valley. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 8 AM Today: Chino Valley 0 to 1 inches Paulden 0 to 1 inches Payson 0 to 1 inches Pine-Strawberry 1 to 2 inches Prescott Valley 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Gila County; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
